author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Eripe me de inimicis meis, deus meus, et ab insurgentibus in me libera me.
text.1: Ahrede me, halig god,           hefiges niðes
text.2: feonda minra,           þe me feohtað to;
text.3: alys me fram laðum         þe me lungre on
text.4: risan willað,           nymþe þu me ræd gife.
text.5: Eripe me de operantibus iniquitatem, et de uiris sanguinum salua me.
text.8: and me wið blodhreowes weres           bealuwe gehæle.
